name: Burt Roger II (Pirate Jam 2020)
description:
Collect loot and fight of Spanish Armada.

Use LEFT and RIGHT arrow to turn your ship, and UP arrow to move forward.

You need to navigate so enemy ships move into your ships port to attack them. Same rules apply to your ship, if you move into enemy ships port, they will attack.

For every attack or stolen loot, your bounty meter will fill up. Once bounty is placed on your head, enemy ships will chase you down for period of time.

Art by Kenney
